PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2006-02402006-04-28,  ,  TC,  , 
ActPilotage Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE AUTHORITY REGULATIONS by, among other things, adding Canadian-registered offshore supply vessels of 5000 gross tons or less that regularly operate from their homeport to the list of vessels which are not subject to the compulsory pilotage requirements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2006-0073 Publication Date: 2006-05-17
